thread.title: Abhishek Bachchan & Aishwarya Rai Are Arguing Over This Matter
thread.title_full: Abhishek Bachchan & Aishwarya Rai Are Arguing Over This Matter

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Abhishek Bachchan & Aishwarya Rai Are Arguing Over This Matter
text:
Sukriti Gumber Mar . 6 . 2017 Araadhya Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai, Abhishek Bachchan 
Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai are one of the most loved couples in Bollywood and never fail to give us major couple goals. Lately, however, they are not on the same page about a particular matter. 
If reports are to be believed, Abhi and Ash have conflicting opinions about their daughter, Araadhya Bachchan ‘s entry in Bollywood. While Abhishek reportedly wants his daughter to start doing films early and hone her acting skills, mommy dearest begs to differ as she does not want her to enter the industry at such a tender age. The contrasting take on this matter has led to a rift between the parents. 
It’s a cute reason to argue, if you ask me! But we hope they sort it out soon enough! 6
